00057 #ifdef CONFIG_SYSCTL
00058 static struct ctl_table_header *obd_table_header;
00059 #endif
00060 
00061 static int
00062 proc_set_timeout(struct ctl_table *table, int write, void __user *buffer,
00063                  size_t *lenp, loff_t *ppos)
00064 {
00065         int rc;
00066 
00067         rc = proc_dointvec(table, write, buffer, lenp, ppos);
00068         if (ldlm_timeout >= obd_timeout)
00069                 ldlm_timeout = max(obd_timeout / 3, 1U);
00070         return rc;
00071 }
00072 
00073 static int
00074 proc_memory_alloc(struct ctl_table *table, int write, void __user *buffer,
00075                   size_t *lenp, loff_t *ppos)
00076 {
00077         char buf[22];
00078         int len;
00079 
00080         if (!*lenp || (*ppos && !write)) {
00081                 *lenp = 0;
00082                 return 0;
00083         }
00084         if (write)
00085                 return -EINVAL;
00086 
00087         len = snprintf(buf, sizeof(buf), LPU64"\n", obd_memory_sum());
00088         if (len > *lenp)
00089                 len = *lenp;
00090         buf[len] = '\0';
00091         if (copy_to_user(buffer, buf, len))
00092                 return -EFAULT;
00093         *lenp = len;
00094         *ppos += *lenp;
00095         return 0;
00096 }
00097 
00098 static int
00099 proc_mem_max(struct ctl_table *table, int write, void __user *buffer,
00100              size_t *lenp, loff_t *ppos)
00101 {
00102         char buf[22];
00103         int len;
00104 
00105         if (!*lenp || (*ppos && !write)) {
00106                 *lenp = 0;
00107                 return 0;
00108         }
00109         if (write)
00110                 return -EINVAL;
00111 
00112         len = snprintf(buf, sizeof(buf), LPU64"\n", obd_memory_max());
00113         if (len > *lenp)
00114                 len = *lenp;
00115         buf[len] = '\0';
00116         if (copy_to_user(buffer, buf, len))
00117                 return -EFAULT;
00118         *lenp = len;
00119         *ppos += *lenp;
00120         return 0;
00121 }
00122 
00123 static int
00124 proc_max_dirty_pages_in_mb(struct ctl_table *table, int write,
00125                            void __user *buffer, size_t *lenp, loff_t *ppos)
00126 {
00127         __s64 val;
00128         int rc = 0;
00129 
00130         if (!table->data || !table->maxlen || !*lenp || (*ppos && !write)) {
00131                 *lenp = 0;
00132                 return 0;
00133         }
00134         if (write) {
00135                 rc = lprocfs_str_with_units_to_s64(buffer, *lenp, &val, 'M');
00136                 if (rc)
00137                         return rc;
00138 
00139                 if (val < 0)
00140                         return -ERANGE;
00141 
00142                 val >>= PAGE_CACHE_SHIFT;
00143 
00144                 /* Don't allow them to let dirty pages exceed 90% of system
00145                  * memory and set a hard minimum of 4MB. */
00146                 if (val > ((totalram_pages / 10) * 9)) {
00147                         CERROR("Refusing to set max dirty pages to "LPD64", "
00148                                "which is more than 90%% of available RAM; "
00149                                "setting to %lu\n", val,
00150                                ((totalram_pages / 10) * 9));
00151                         obd_max_dirty_pages = ((totalram_pages / 10) * 9);
00152                 } else if (val < 4 << (20 - PAGE_CACHE_SHIFT)) {
00153                         obd_max_dirty_pages = 4 << (20 - PAGE_CACHE_SHIFT);
00154                 } else {
00155                         obd_max_dirty_pages = val;
00156                 }
00157         } else {
00158                 char buf[21];
00159                 int len;
00160 
00161                 len = lprocfs_read_frac_helper(buf, sizeof(buf),
00162                                                *(unsigned long *)table->data,
00163                                                1 << (20 - PAGE_CACHE_SHIFT));
00164                 if (len > *lenp)
00165                         len = *lenp;
00166                 buf[len] = '\0';
00167                 if (copy_to_user(buffer, buf, len))
00168                         return -EFAULT;
00169                 *lenp = len;
00170         }
00171         *ppos += *lenp;
00172         return rc;
00173 }

00292 static struct ctl_table parent_table[] = {
00293         {
00294                 INIT_CTL_NAME
00295                 .procname       = "lustre",
00296                 .data           = NULL,
00297                 .maxlen         = 0,
00298                 .mode           = 0555,
00299                 .child          = obd_table
00300         },
00301         { 0 }
00302 };
00303 #endif
00304 
00305 void obd_sysctl_init (void)
00306 {
00307 #ifdef CONFIG_SYSCTL
00308         if ( !obd_table_header )
00309                 obd_table_header = register_sysctl_table(parent_table);
00310 #endif
00311 }
00312 
00313 void obd_sysctl_clean (void)
00314 {
00315 #ifdef CONFIG_SYSCTL
00316         if ( obd_table_header )
00317                 unregister_sysctl_table(obd_table_header);
00318         obd_table_header = NULL;
00319 #endif
00320 }
